info: Tranche 4 for $180 million is to finance the introduction of (i) environmental protection equipment, and (ii) railway safety enhancement equipment. It is included in the ADB lending pipeline for the PRC as a firm loan for 2013. The government asked ADB to consider providing a larger tranche of $350 million but since this could not be accommodated within available 2013 lending resources, it was agreed to proceed with Tranche 4 for $180 million in 2013, to be followed by Tranche 5 for $170 million for approval in early 2014.
name: RAILWAY ENERGY EFFICIENCY AND SAFETY ENHANCEMENT INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 5
